text: {{Infobox writer | name = Juan Valera | image = Juan Valera.jpg | caption = Juan Valera | birth_date = 18 October 1824 | birth_place = Cabra | death_date = 18 April 1905 | death_place = Madrid | occupation = Politician, diplomat }} Juan Valera y Alcalá-Galiano (October 18 1824 – April 18 1905), was a Spanish author, writer and political figure. ==References== Category:Spanish novelists
title: Juan Valera
